title: Fedra and... what sans? For African Women
content: OK so we are looking at Fedra Serif or a magazine project and looking at alternative sans serif family to accompany it, it is a female African Magazine...how about Amplitude - any thoughts out there on this combination? Any other suggestions?
author: newageadam

comments.content: This might be better posed in the "Design" forum.
You know there's a Fedra Sans, right?
Is it Fedra Serif A or B? What if Lucida Sans was paired with Fedra?
